TopicTitle: Random Launch Stabilizers Falling from the Sky

Articles.Content: I've been trying to launch a very large, 1.8 million credit rocket to Vall. But I've had a problem. TT18-A Launch Stability Enhancers keep falling from sky, and hitting the outer boosters, causing them to explode and the entire rocket to follow. To counter this problem, i've had to use cheats to turn off crash damage. Is there a way to stop those things from falling from nowhere?
This is a known bug, fixes for it are available here, or here.

Caused by them being included when the world is moved around the vessel for the floating origin. Fixed in 1.0.5 but you can ensure it doesn't happen for now by tucking the stabilizers closer to the center of the launch pad or running http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129870
